channel.title: Donda on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Donda on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘In Whose Name?’ Review: The Chronicle of Kanye West’s Chaos That You Never Asked For
item.description: Filmmaker Nico Ballesteros followed the hip-hop superstar for six years, through marital troubles with Kim Kardashian, anti-Semitic outbursts and a budding relationship with Donald Trump.
